sentences.en: Over a tenth of the population have secure, undemanding jobs.
sentences.cn: 超过1/10的人口拥有稳定且相对轻松的工作。

sentences.en: She was easy and undemanding and always had a quick reply.
sentences.cn: 她是不苛求的,并且总是能迅速回应.

sentences.en: The book is an enjoyable and undemanding read.
sentences.cn: 该书妙趣横生轻松易读。

sentences.en: The pay was adequate and the job undemanding.
Their schedule continues to be undemanding the rest of this week.
sentences.cn: 这周剩余的日程继续比较轻松.

sentences.en: Trading programs tend to be undemanding and run well on older, slower machines.
sentences.cn: 交易软件一般都很简单,可以在老机器上运行良好.

words.tran_cn: 要求不高的；容易的；不严格的

trans.tran_cn: 容易的，要求不高的，不严格的
trans.tran_en: If you describe something such as a job as undemanding, you mean that it does not require you to work very hard or to think a great deal about it
